I think I have just the right fit for you! Have you considered "Fury" (2014)? Directed by David Ayer, this intense war drama stars Brad Pitt as a grizzled tank commander fighting his way across Germany in April 1945. It's a gripping and emotional ride that explores the human side of war.

If you're looking for something a bit more historical and set during World War I, "Flyboys" (2006) might be up your alley! This action-packed film tells the story of the Lafayette Escadrille, a group of young American pilots who volunteered to fight for France. With an all-star cast including James Franco, it's a thrilling ride from start to finish.
